reviews.review:
Basic Summary 
Shots 1-5: Clearly missed. Shots 6-9: Missed due to recoil (bad spray control). Shots 10-11: Very close, but recoil and inaccuracy make these reasonable misses. Shot 12: Likely didn't actually fire because Hiko was already dead.

Honestly the nostalgia and popularity of this game speaks for itself. After recording a little over 300 hours of playtime I can say there is a lot I still need to learn, but it is still one of the most fun FPS shooters I've ever played.
